name: Trigger (itch) (99lab)
description:
2 Player Game

This game consiste in who get the biggest quantity of correct buttons possible before the times end. If in the round has a draw the game goes to a mode of "smash button" who clicks more win.

When occurs a draw of rounds 2x2 the game goes to Sudden Death that consist in both players waits in the screen to appear "GO" and who click the action button first wins.

Win who wins 3 rounds first.

-----

Compatible with Xbox's Controllers - Uses the D-Pad and the A button.

Keyboard:
Player 1 - WASD and C button
Player 2 - Arrows and P button

-----

Team:
Progammers -Lucas lima e Lucas Brabec
Artists - Lucas lima e Ayrton Mathrus
Sound Designer - Lucas Renato

Trigger was developed during the 2º gamejam of the 99lab (www.laboratorio99.com.br), the 99jam. The jam happened at Eurekamob (http://eurekamob.com.br/).
